resources.name: Model Context Protocol Specification
resources.summary: Official MCP protocol specification, documentation site, and reference implementation. Defines JSON-RPC 2.0 based protocol for AI-tool integration.
when_to_consult: Building new MCP servers or clients

resources.name: MCP llms-full.txt
resources.summary: Comprehensive machine-readable documentation of entire MCP ecosystem designed for LLM consumption. Contains full specification, guides, and examples.
when_to_consult: Using LLMs to build MCP components
Getting comprehensive context for AI assistants
ready_solutions: Complete context for AI coding assistants
key_features: Single file with complete MCP knowledge

resources.name: MCP TypeScript SDK
resources.summary: Official TypeScript/JavaScript SDK for building MCP servers and clients. Production-ready with full type safety.

resources.name: MCP Python SDK
resources.summary: Official Python SDK for MCP protocol. Async-first design with type hints and modern Python practices.

resources.name: FastMCP
resources.summary: Production-grade Python framework for building and deploying MCP servers with enterprise features. Includes OAuth, composition, OpenAPI generation, and cloud deployment.
knowledge_areas: Enterprise authentication (Google, GitHub, Azure, Auth0, WorkOS)

resources.name: MetaMCP
resources.summary: Full-featured MCP aggregator, orchestrator, middleware, and gateway with web GUI. Supports namespaces, endpoints, multi-tenancy, and tool-level control.

resources.name: plugged.in MCP Hub
resources.summary: Cloud-based MCP hub with Knowledge (RAG v2), Memory (clipboard), Tools (discovery), and Proxy capabilities. Unified interface with AI features.
knowledge_areas: RAG v2 with AI document exchange
when_to_consult: Want RAG capabilities with AI attribution
OAuth token handling for HTTP servers
key_features: RAG v2 with AI document exchange

resources.name: Docker MCP Gateway
resources.summary: Official Docker MCP gateway CLI plugin for managing containerized MCP servers. Includes catalog, secrets management, and OAuth integration.

resources.name: Cloudflare Remote MCP
resources.summary: Deploy remote MCP servers on Cloudflare Workers with OAuth authentication. Serverless, globally distributed edge compute.

resources.name: MCP Inspector
resources.summary: Official debugging and testing tool for MCP servers. Interactive UI for testing tools, resources, and prompts.

resources.name: Filesystem MCP Server
resources.summary: Official MCP server providing filesystem operations (read, write, search, list). Production-ready reference implementation.
when_to_consult: Need file access in AI workflows
Security best practices for file access

resources.name: GitHub MCP Server
resources.summary: Official GitHub integration providing repository operations, issues, PRs, and file management via MCP.

resources.name: PostgreSQL MCP Server
resources.summary: Database operations via MCP. Provides schema inspection, query execution, and data management for PostgreSQL.

resources.name: Smithery.ai
resources.summary: Cloud platform for deploying and hosting MCP servers. One-click deployment with automatic configuration.

resources.name: mcp-get
resources.summary: Package manager for MCP servers. Install, update, and manage MCP servers from command line.

resources.name: mcp-proxy-server
resources.summary: Simple MCP proxy for aggregating multiple servers. Lightweight TypeScript implementation.

resources.name: mcp-remote
resources.summary: Adapter for connecting STDIO-only clients to remote SSE/HTTP MCP servers.
when_to_consult: Connecting Claude Desktop to remote servers

resources.name: Open WebUI MCP Integration
resources.summary: Open-source ChatGPT-like UI with MCP server support via OpenAPI endpoints.

resources.name: LangChain MCP Integration
resources.summary: LangChain toolkit for integrating MCP servers as LangChain tools.

resources.name: LlamaIndex MCP Integration
resources.summary: LlamaIndex integration for using MCP servers as tools and data sources.

resources.name: Awesome MCP Servers
resources.summary: Curated list of MCP servers, tools, and resources. Community-maintained directory.

resources.name: SQLite MCP Server
resources.summary: SQLite database operations via MCP. Schema inspection, queries, and data management.

resources.name: Slack MCP Server
resources.summary: Slack integration for reading channels, users, threads, and sending messages via MCP.

resources.name: Google Drive MCP Server
resources.summary: Google Drive integration for file operations, search, and sharing via MCP.

resources.name: Cursor MCP Documentation
resources.summary: Official Cursor IDE documentation for MCP integration. Configuration and usage guide.

resources.summary: Official Anthropic documentation for using MCP with Claude Desktop. Setup and configuration guide.

resources.name: MCP Market
resources.summary: Community marketplace for discovering and sharing MCP servers. Searchable catalog with ratings.

resources.summary: MCP server directory with search, categories, and integration examples.

resources.summary: Comprehensive MCP server registry with search, tags, and deployment guides.

resources.summary: Curated MCP server directory with focus on AI/ML integrations and Chinese market.
